name: Doodle Bugs
description:
Attention! Attention! World Roach Games on the air!
Garbage can champions, dump athletes, and great waste masters are about to match their strength in the unique roach jumping competition.
Help your bug perform the vault of the century, winning the hearts of spectators and referees from all over the world! The judges are strict, but if you can be bold and brave, grabbing a bunch of yummy leftovers as you go, they'll be totally smashed! You'll have to break your head – literally – to get on the winner's podium at all 50 levels, but oh well – everything has its price.
Be a champion, control your bugs!

Game features:
- fun game with bug athletes
- unusual game mechanics
- simple but addictive gameplay
- amazing tricks and vaults
- special skills and boosts
